name: Race in Traffic Highway
description:
Highway Super Car Racer game is extreme fast speed track racing arcade game! Drive your own top auto racing car in the busy highway traffic from the road is skilled driving experience, so try Accelerate Your Real turbo car driving skills. Choose your favorite racing car for endless drive,
Fasten your seat belt and trust is your car engine and tilt your device to move wheels to drift your car across the traffic wherever you want, dodge the traffic vehicles bus, car, truck, black box of a pickup truck, ambulance, motor bike and in the Tankers, Earn money and buy new cars and upgrade on their engines racing to win the war. Multiple camera angles dashboard, upper view, side view and 3rd person camera view to ENHANCE Driving Experience. Sometime wild animals crossing the road are so Avoid Them hitting and killing on the road.
City Traffic Drift Racing Provide Advance 2017 features for young boys and girls who love racing games, in Traffic rider simulation 4x4 games in Which You Can Avoid to accidents and Easily overtake traffic vehicles with pressure brake, real drift racing and gear change sound in this War combat racing game. 4 Detailed environments City Center, Desert, Countryside and highway road. After play this game Realistic car physics you can say I am the champion of City Traffic Drift Racing 2017 Games. Spin and luxury alloy wheel balancing speed is your hot wheels with realistic Stability and be a real racer car fever. Experience of automobile racers Whose are Well known for riding Highway Traffic Rules and Regulation 3d and amazing records, ranks in the top class Highway Traffic Racing Rivals. Slow your new car to overtake the bus, coach, animal cargo vehicles and other cars on the busy highway traffic.

Traffic Challenge racing car Features:

Multiple types of racing cars and truck for players to choose sports, drift, off road 4x4 jeeps
Realistic Traffic Movement Behavior change traffic lanes, realistic accident and damage, move in Different speed,
    Cops car in traffic
The Endless Racing Game with Different rewards and bonuses
4 Detailed environments City Center, Desert, Countryside and highway
Upgrade vehicles engine, wheels, alloy rims, color and many more
Some features are paid, you can upgrade for their feature to pay some money through a App Store account
Traffic Exciting race tracks with the various traffic Intuitive and smooth steering and tilt control
3 game mode in time trail, endless and free ride
The faster you drive get more score
Overtake closely with the Traffic Vehicles over 100km / h speed to get extra bonus points
Stunning 3D graphics and realistic animations
Support for 13 languages
Drive in tow traffic to get extra bonus cash
